effect.ruby_sapphire: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.emerald: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

effect.colosseum: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect.xd: The user’s HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn. If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.emerald: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.colosseum: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
short_effect.xd: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.
flavor_text.emerald: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user endures any hit with 1 HP left. It may fail if used in succession.
